name: enrapture
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to give someone very great pleasure: The performance enraptured adults and children alike.
More examplesFewer examplesThe comedy is innocent enough for kids and weird enough to enrapture adults.The magic of his music still enraptures us.The film enraptures us with the terror and wonder of flying close to the sun. Enrapturing fans with a choir full of voices and an orchestra's worth of instruments, the soaring melodies are tempered with a pop sensibility.
